name: S_Q_U_E_A_k
description:
This is a short little piece made for my class. I thought it'd be nice to share this with others as well. It's a bit of a mess but I still hope you like it.

You must survive an endless swarm of squeaky enemies as long as you can. The only thing keeping you safe is your gun and your skill. Good luck.

Stay on the platform and don't get SQUEAKED.

Controls are WASD for movement, space to jump, mouse to aim and shoot, esc to close game, and R to restart the level.
